title: @riotjaredan
body:
any future lore updates for shaco? (since the institute of war is no longer canon, and his lore is not as mysterious or disturbing as it could be, it just kinda is that mysterious guys nobody know cliche)
i also heard about a story someone was writing about him

replies.body:
I can't give an ETA, sorry, but Shaco is on the list of those due some love. The story you mention is just a pitch that I know one of the writers is looking to seek his teeth into, but he has a bunch of stuff on his plate. 

I know when your favorite Champ hasn't received the attention he or she deserves it can be frustrating, but, as you can see from Universe, Piltover, and from what is to come, various teams are working on content to fill the gaps we know exist.

We're all looking forward to when we have in place the content we want for all our Champions.
Do you know if the Piltover story stuff will affect the Warwick rework
All the teams involved have been communicating and using each other as resources across each production.
Oh yeah slightly off topic are you gonna pop back on to ask.fm

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ONi5jR7l,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2016-12-01T22:24:38.451+0000)
>
> All the teams involved have been communicating and using each other as resources across each production.

The Universe page reveal seems like a year long planned event, were you also included the fan feedback of wanting a centralized hub for all the lore. The whole thing is nicely formated in a way that additional stuff could be added upon it in the future. The next step that I see as a fan is to nicely intergrate it within the Client itself which would attract even more players to search and read the lore.

Each additional lore story add small details to the world (it ether being stuff like mentionings of different languages, mythos, places, and traditions), and its truly something I believe all of us were waiting for. For me in a funny way its also a interesting challenge piecing for example: all the places locations on Runeterra, there are quite a few mentioned in the past year (some with definitive known placements, while some less so). 

Seeing the small map of surrounding Piltover area made me happy since that will just add to what I would like to see more and its the geography of the world.

All Im saying is, good job Riot, and I cant wait to see more in the close future as it would seem :)

Its pretty likely that warwick is gonna come out within the next 3 patches(likely the one after Camille or maybe the one after that).
I mean look at the piltover page and you'll notice that it also has a zaun-part that is inaccessible right now,which will likely be added with the warwick rework.
The Warwick rework is well into production, so I'm sure they already considered the Piltover story when updating Warwick.
How long do we have to wait for the rest of the Piltover stories? This week? Next? December?
If it's anything like Shurima, we'll probably get the rest over the course of the next few weeks with 1 or 2 every few days.
Have there been any talks of Shaco knowing Jhin or Lulu? Jhin is a lot like Shaco (invisible traps, exploding knives, and theater masks) and Lulu has a song with Shaco.

After Warwick's visual and gameplay update comes Galio's. Any chance this means we could be getting a Demacia-themed lore event to go along with his VGU, similar to the one Piltover and Zaun are getting with updated bios and color texts for all Demacian champions...? 

Of course, you don't have to answer that because I know you're not allowed to give certain surprises away but, THE SUSPENSE IS KILLING ME HERE

No doubt on the Demacia lore part. Galio may have a prominent role in Demacian history, since hopefully he will have some ties to Poppy who was older than the nations founding and previously had ties with the ancient Gargoyle.

Also look at some of the icons in this picture:
https://cdnb3.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/004/017/127/large/sperasoft-studio-icons1.jpg?1479485276

We already know Piltover and Zaun icons will be distributed in the lore update soon to follow since its shown on the main page of the factions ( plus the icons have surfaced on the PBE), one could also assume Demacia and the rest will get their icons in a similar event, most likely these types of icons.

Oh hey, I hadn't seen those icons before. Looks like most of the faction crests are there, that's awesome. Where'd you find these?

I do truly hope Demacia's story expansion/event comes with Galio's update, I'm afraid they'll just slot it for some future VGU though, like Garen's or Vayne's or some such.
